Mayor Mike Rosen
----------------

Mayor Mike Rosen was elected Mayor in November 2023. He officially took office on January 1, 2024. His term expires on December 31, 2027.

### 2026 Budget Address

Edmonds Mayor Mike Rosen's 2026 Budget Address was presented September 30th, 2025 at the Edmonds Waterfront Center.

Mid Biennial Budget Presentation
Proposed Modified Budget Strategic Overview

[Mayor's 2025 Budget Presentation (Slides)](https://www.edmondswa.gov/UserFiles/Servers/Server_16494932/File/Government/Departments/Mayor's%20Office/Mayor's%20Budget%20Address/2026_Mid_Bienium_Modification_Presentation.pdf "budget")
